hero.title: Innovative Leader in Stainless Steel Industry

hero.description: Building an industry benchmark enterprise with over 200M RMB annual revenue through the power of gentleness and resilience

about.title: About KIKI
about.subtitle: A Journey of Innovation and Perseverance
about.description: I am Kiki Zhang, a female entrepreneur with 13 years of expertise in the stainless steel industry and founder of Shunjiaxing Stainless Steel Group. As a woman, I firmly believe that gentleness and resilience can coexist, and innovation and responsibility can go hand in hand.

items.description: Embarked on a new journey with dreams

company.description: Industry benchmark enterprise with over 200M RMB annual revenue and 300+ employees

items.title: Advanced Manufacturing

items.title: Technology and Service Excellence
items.description: Professional technical team with full-process quality control, continuous process innovation and performance optimization
